Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: Dear friends!  We are excited to announce the official launch of CopyTrade system – the system of automated trading on the Binance exchange platform is now available for all the subscribers. Receiving signals and carrying out transactions on the exchange platform is done automatically without direct participation of a user. Crypto exchange platforms operate 24 hours a day and the system will monitor the signals and generate profits for you the whole time!  The use of CopyTrade* system is a paid service for all the subscribers. It is necessary to deposit funds to one’s RichLand account in the bot (“Referrals” - “Add funds” section, there will be a “Wallet” option added from which one is able to withdraw and deposit funds in the future). Funds will be withdrawn from the account daily in accordance to the tariffs. Commission amount depends on the deposit amount:  MIN deposit - MAX deposit / RichLand interest rate per month Under $100 / 9,00% $101 - $500 / 8,00% $501 - $1 000 / 7,00% $1 001 - $1 500 / 6,00% $1 501 - $2 500 / 5,00% $2 501 - $5 000 / 4,00% $5 001 - $10 000 / 3,00% $10 001 - $25 000 / 2,00% $25 001 - $50 000 / 1,50% $50 001 - $100 000 / 1,25% Over $100 001 / 1,00%  Example: your deposit amount is $5047, in this case the daily charge is $5047 * 0,03 / 30 = $5,05. The bot checks the balance daily; a recalculation is made in accordance to tariffs depicted above in case the balance decreases or increases (deposit/ withdrawal of funds or fixation of profits) by minimal/ maximum tariff value. Consequently, the higher your Binance balance is, the lower RichLand commission will be.  Please note, the referral rewards, which can be used for paying for the CopyTrade service as well, will be deposited to the wallet directly.  All daily transactions (payments) participate in the 10-stage RichLand referral program. Each transaction generates rewards for the uplink!  Signals will be copied for your whole deposit on the Binance exchange platform, which is connected to our bot. 10% of free capital is always used when purchasing an asset on the exchange platform through the bot’s signal.  For example, in case your deposit is $10 000 and a signal is received, then $1000 will be used to purchase an asset. Let’s assume that you earned 20% from the signal. You balance will be: $9000 + $1200 = $10 200. Consequently, the next signal will also use 10% from the available capital, i.e. $1020. This allows for you to always have available funds to purchase the next asset and diversify your balance regardless from the size of the capital.  Attention! Yet another exciting announcement: the price of standard subscription for RichLand trade signals remains the same - $49 per month (excluding discounts when paying for 3-6-12 months)!  *- It is necessary to have an active (paid) subscription for RichLand service in order to use the CopyTrade system.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: There are two main types of ads: 1. Banner ads in catalogues. This ad type is similar to top-of-page ads in search engines. If a user’s search query matches the keywords chosen by an advertiser or our A.I., the user will see that advertiser’s ads. For example, if a client is looking for “yellow shoes,” relevant ads will be displayed at the top of the search page.  2. Contextual advertising. Gem4me Market Space is built over the Gem4me messenger, which means that there’s a near-infinite amount of helpful advertising data. For example, if Gem4me Market Space sees that a user visits shoe stores online, they can direct that same person to shoe-centric Gem4me groups. Users will be able to choose whether to join these channels or not — but both merchants and consumers stand to benefit from this discovery feature. Author: finnadventurer
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: How do you position yourself, as a platform where a seller and a buyer just communicate with each other and then it is out of your jurisdiction or you are market platform like Amazon, where a seller and a buyer do no communicate at all but the platform do everything for them?

Author: Gem4me_Market_Space
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: Thanks for the good one!  Actually, seller and buyer will be communicating directly, but Market Space as a trading platform will also be a part of the process providing for several useful features listed below:  - Gem4me Market Space’s blockchain solution ensures that transactions are secure, and creates a universal verification system wherein users can access all available stores safely after using KYC verification. All payment transactions (in physical and online payments) are carried out via, and stored on the blockchain. As a result, getting proof-of-payment is always possible, ensuring transparency.  - Another key feature of the platform is a built-in escrow system that doesn’t release funds until a product is received. This means that merchants only receive funds after a customer has verifiably received their product, adding another layer of security to Gem4me Market Space.  - The blockchain-distributed feedback system that lets you leave indelible, tamper-proof feedback, making Gem4me Market Space merchants transparent — and rewarding excellent customers and merchants. This way, the platform and the users in it are optimized for fair competition, while the risk of fraud is minimized.

Author: finnadventurer
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: But in this case scammers can act on the buyer side. For example, I bought something, it was delivered but I say that is was not and ask my money back. How are you going to solve this problem?

Author: Gem4me_Market_Space
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: Gem4me Market Space is hosted via the blockchain. All recordings and transactions are stored indefinitely, and adding to them costs GMC tokens. This means GMC tokens pay for blockchain-recorded actions like:  a. KYC Verification. b. Review authenticity verification. c. Leaving feedback that affects user reputation. d. Store transactions that count towards Back4Cash eligibility. e. Past purchases, sales and other transactions. f. Credit scores and payment histories affecting the ability to get and give credit. g. Using blockchain technologies helps protect Gem4me Market Space and the users inside it from counterfeit goods, malicious retailers and data manipulation.  As you can see blockchain offers a way to get a good feel on the level of trustability each party has within Market Space platform (meaning both buyers and merchants), having in mind that KYC completion will be required for all users and merchants prior to entering the platform, there will be full transparency in terms of all identities for every party on the platform.  Of course, no one can give you a 100% guarantee that some particular user has no fraudulent intentions and won't try to go out and attempt theft, but since every piece of information is stored and transparent on the blockchain, there will be a way for the seller to prove the product was actually delivered, assign the scammer negative rating or even go for legal prosecution of the scammer. Regulation is coming to the market. Welcome the good news.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: The Gem4me Market Space Ecosystem is a unique, decentralized blockchain protocol that does 2 things. First, lets businesses of all sizes reach their potential customers efficiently, internationally and with little friction. Second, letting customer audiences of all kinds and sizes choose reliable, high-quality products and vendors.  Businesses can connect to the ecosystem using an API protocol or via chat-bot integration, and international transactions are easy and cheap. The result is a "win-win" ecosystem where vendors get unique benefits and market access, while buyers get new goods and services. If a user’s search query matches the keywords chosen by an advertiser or our A.I., the user will see that advertiser’s ads. For example, if a client is looking for «yellow shoes», relevant ads will be displayed at the top of the search page.  Contextual advertising Gem4me Market Space is built over the Gem4me messenger, which means that there’s a near-infinite amount of helpful advertising data. For example, if Gem4me Market Space sees that a user visits shoe stores online, they can direct that same person to shoe-centric Gem4me groups. Author: Gem4me_Market_Space
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: Thank you for the question.  Fraud  All shops/dealers will be moderated, there will be a way for a user to report fraud related actions by dealers. Basically we will use the same ways other e-commerce platforms use. In our case a rating score of the shop/dealer (as well as the buyer) will be reflected on blockchain, this will be another means of fraud control and identification. Low rating score will show how trustable the shop/dealer/buyer is, unreliable parties won't be welcomed for any cooperation. And one more thing: all sellers/dealers/shops will have to provide their KYC for verification, this will be another means of protection from fraud.  Another key feature of our platform is a built-in escrow system that doesn’t release funds until a product is received. This means that merchants only receive funds after a customer has verifiably received their product, adding another layer of security to Gem4me Market Space.  Hackers  Blockchain technology means that Gem4me Market Space’s records cannot be hacked in any meaningful way. Records of transactions, purchases, sales, remittances and other data are effectively indelible. Mistakes can happen due to human error - but you virtually cannot lose money to malicious individuals while using Gem4me Market Space correctly.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Gem4me Market Space (GMC)
Body: They complement each other.  Our ultimate goal is to make Gem4me Market Space the most global and convenient e-commerce market application and safe transaction ecosystem in the world. Using modern technologies will help us give customers simplicity, transparency and value. Having worked on the project for over a year to date, we’re already far along the development timeline, and are positive and conﬁdent about our continued success. Late April saw the beta release of market space’s store building chatbot: a tool that helps users build stores quickly and easily. The chatbot is currently being tested and used to help merchants populate the platform.  For example: In addition to helping close sales, chatbots help Gem4me Market Space users in a variety of ways. For example, opening your own e-store is as easy as answering a bot’s questions. The bot guides you through choosing an e-store name, choosing categories and geolocation, and even uploading photos, product prices, product descriptions and more. Bots also help you ﬁll up your store with goods, and help you import from WordPress, Joomla and other content platforms directly into Gem4me Market Space  As for customers - Over the last few years, chatbots have become a lot better - to the point that Gem4me Market Space’s A.I.s come across as human more often than not. Today’s chatbots can perform ever-moreadvanced functions like: targeting users by geolocation, weighing the importance of a review, searching for similar offers, and more.
